channel.title: Client help cant get onlne
channel.description:
so i've found this wonderfull server called torva pkz 1. im completely new to the rsps buissness. ive been 5 days searching for answers but there is no good tutorial to be honest thats very detailed i searched this whole forumns and nothing. so anyways im trying to get my server up. i downloaded torva pkz v1 source and client. i made a no-ip acc and i have it installed with a host ip. and i downloaded utorrent to use as a subitute to portfowarding and when i go to check canyouseeme.org it says that the port 43594 is open and its working only ofcourse when i have utorrent open. my problem is how i get my server online . since i have all the tools how would i know tis online and how do i get other people online. thats my questions please answer asap and detailed please thank you. and dont be a fag coming in here sayin "wrong section" cuz u just want more post count.
-Hey adobe im having trouble with the router part. i allready replaced the 127.0.0.1 or whatever with my no-ip host name, but how do i do that router part how do i configure that be more specific on that part if we need to team view we can do that just anything to get this server up and running

item.title: Client help cant get onlne

item.description:
@noob_manner wrote:

im still having probllems anyone please team view with me brand brand spanking new to this and ive tried everything but i cant get it online. ill apprechiate if someone can help me know how to put it online and how to know how other people can play in my server and what they need to download or whatever so please reply and tell me if you cant explain it in a post we can team view this crap. thanks for ur time

Read full topic

item.title: Client help cant get onlne
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

client folder<client.java<control+f search server =
you will find this when downloading the client: server = "127.0.0.1";
you need to make an account on no-ip.com and add a host, then put the host ip where 127.0.0.1 is, example: server = "example.no-ip.org";
And if your router hosting then you need to go onto your router and add it to your “portforwarding tab”= http://prntscr.com/2a9wu Yes is do understand all router will most likely look different but, im just showing an example ;p, now you need to add something close to this: http://prntscr.com/2a9x9 the ip’s will be different to figure out yours go to start<run…<cmd<type “ipconfig” and it will show your default gateway adress, (you put your ip4adress on your no-ip host) then go into gui.java and search “ip” and you will get something like: UIManager.setLookAndFeel(UIManager.getSystemLookAndFeelClassName()); sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName("example.no-ip.org"));
change example.no-ip.org to your no-ip. and wallah. (i think xD) just started hosting myself. -might be abit different because this is with an router but, im sure there wouldn’t be much to change with utorrent if so, then just ignore this post…

[quote=“nsfpure, post:2, topic:403794”]click run.bat

and to get people to play use the server status page.[/quote]

^ you do have to do alot more then click run.bat, common sence…

Read full topic
